title: some targeted abilities should not be usable on minions
body: the amount of times that i have missed out on a kill because of thiss bull****. now some spells like zileans bomb are ok for wave clear. but why would i ever want to stun a minion as irelia, or fear a minion as fiddlesticks? maybe a super minion or canon but definity not regular minions.  they really need to overhaul some targeted spells to target champions and monsters only :/

replies.body: You know there's a setting to only target champions, right?
This. I bound my "target champions only" key to spacebar. So easyyyy.

I myself have had times as pantheon where I have needed to use my stun on a minion just so it doesn't kill me. You could also use Irelias stun to last hit a minion you wouldn't other wise be able to get. There are tonnes of potential reasons you could want to do it. Although Riot do remove skills which they deem useless to use on minions such as Sorakas mana to allies couldn't be used on your own minions.

small minions usually don't proc, pantheon's passive, pantheon's spells are ok because you can troll stun a minion on your way out of a tower dive to block your third tower shot. but it is annoying to be clicking directly on a champion just to only get cs and then they trololol away on 2hp
